guideContainer.name: guide1
guideContainer.thankYouMessage: Thank you for submitting the form.

guidetextdraw._value:
• Registration must be completed in full during one session
  • It will take approximately 20-30 minutes to complete your registration.
  • The registration form will time out after 23 minutes of inactivity.
  • During the registration process, you are unable to save information to complete at a later date. However, you may use the "Previous" button to go back to a previous window in the registration form to edit your information.
  • All fields are mandatory, unless otherwise specified.
  • In order to register, you must provide a valid business number. Only one (1) Organization Profile will be accepted per Canada Revenue Agency business number.
  • You must provide at least one (1) document proving the organization's legal status. You may include more than one document if necessary (up to a limit of 10 MB)

Please ensure that you have read the Registration Information Checklist section before filling out the form below and that you have all the required information to complete your registration.

If you require assistance, please contact us at partners-partenaires@international.gc.ca
guidetextdraw.name: textdraw1585848351240

guidetextdraw_copy._value:
Partners@International Agreement

This is an agreement between you ("you") and the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development, thereafter designated as "Global Affairs Canada" ("GAC"). This Agreement outlines the terms of use of GAC's Partners@International system, a web application designed for preparing and submitting profiles and funding applications to GAC. By clicking the "I Accept" button below you agree to comply with all the provisions of this Agreement. You consent to the electronic exchange of information and documents between you and GAC over the Internet or by e-mail. This electronic Agreement is equivalent to a written paper agreement between you and GAC. The effective date of this Agreement is the date you click the "I Accept" button below. The Agreement shall remain in effect unless either party has delivered to the other party by fax, courier or regular mail a written notice of intent not to renew.
guidetextdraw_copy.name: textdraw1585848351240

guidetextdraw_copy_c._value:
Scope

This Agreement covers the use (by you) of the Partners@International web application system and all related documentation, including but not limited to documentation and instructions (collectively "Documentation"), and all technical services provided by GAC, including assistance in the preparation of your Organization Profile viewed on screen, printed and/or filed electronically and services provided by the GAC help desk.
guidetextdraw_copy_c.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_1

guidetextdraw_copy_c_341115590._value:
Authorized Use

GAC grants you a personal, non-exclusive, non-assignable, royalty-free, non-sublicenseable, revocable right to access, read and use the Partners@International web application solely for the purposes of registering and managing an Organization Profile and preparing funding applications for submission to GAC.

No documentation available on this web site may be copied, reproduced, republished, downloaded, transmitted, or distributed in any way other than for the purposes above. You agree not to modify, in any way, the Partners@International web application or any of the associated documentation; nor to remove any copyright, other proprietary or product identification notices contained thereon.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_341115590.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_2

guidetextdraw_copy_c_1187355264._value:
Representations and Warranties

You warrant and represent that:

  • You are duly authorized to enter into and perform this Agreement and such performance is not limited, restricted or in conflict with any other agreement;
  • You are authorized to represent, prepare and submit organization information for profiles and/or funding applications on behalf of your organization and that your organization is fully aware of this responsibility and capability;
  • Any information provided to GAC pursuant to this Agreement is authorized to be so provided by the owner of the information.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_1187355264.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_3

guidetextdraw_copy_c_1690487707._value:
Disclaimer

This web site, the Partners@International web application and its documentation are provided on an "as is" basis without any representations, warranties, guarantees or conditions, of any kind, whether expressed or implied, statutory or otherwise, including but not limited to, warranties as to uninterrupted or error free operation, availability, accuracy, completeness, currentness, reliability, timeliness, legality, suitability, privacy, security, merchantability, quality, title, non-infringement or fitness for a particular purpose, or those arising out of a course of dealing or usage of trade.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_1690487707.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_4_copy_5_copy_1_copy_1

guidetextdraw_copy_c_652710296._value:
Limitation of Liability and Damages

In no event shall GAC be liable for any damages or losses, howsoever caused, including but not limited to, lost profits, lost savings, loss of use or lack of availability of facilities including computer resources, routers and stored data, special, indirect, incidental, punitive, exemplary, aggravated, economic or consequential damages, contribution or indemnity, arising out of the use, or inability to use, the web site, the Partners@International web application, and its, documentation, or services provided under this Agreement.

Without restricting the generality of the foregoing, GAC shall not be liable for damages or losses resulting from: viruses, data corruption, failed messages, transmission errors or problems; telecommunications service providers; links to third-party web sites; the Internet backbone; personal injury; third-party content, products or services; damages or losses caused by you or your respective employees, agents or subcontractors.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_652710296.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_5

guidetextdraw_copy_c_2046956939._value:
Security and Confidentiality

You acknowledge and agree that you are the only person authorized to use your user identification and password and that you bear full responsibility for preserving the confidentiality of your user identification and password as well as for the risk involved in divulging this information. Furthermore, you are responsible for all functionality available to and performed under your user account. In addition, you are also responsible for any changes made by third parties to whom you have granted access.

By providing your personal information, you are consenting to GAC's collection, use, disclosure, retention and protection of your personal information pursuant to GAC's rights and obligations under the Privacy Act and the Access to Information Act. You acknowledge that the information you provide is stored on the GAC servers and agree that certain information will be kept by GAC for its records. Personal information means any information about an identifiable individual, as set out in Section 3 of the Privacy Act. GAC will not access your information without your prior approval. GAC is authorized to collect your personal information pursuant to the Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Act section 10(2)(e).

GAC uses session cookies to manage your interactive session. A cookie is an identification tag that our server creates when you enter the GAC web site. No information, personal or otherwise, is stored on your computer once the session is complete.

When you close your browser, the session cookie is removed. As a security measure, if your session has been inactive for a period of 30 minutes, the cookie is used to determine whether your session has timed-out. If so, you will be required to login to the web application again, and all unsaved information will be lost.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_2046956939.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_4

guidetextdraw_copy_c_257448901._value:
Ownership and Copyrights

You acknowledge that:

  • GAC or its licensors are the owners of the Partners@International web application and all the documentation or other software GAC uses in connection with this web site;
  • GAC retains all rights, title and interest, including all intellectual property rights, in and to the Partners@International system and all its documentation; and
  • all or portions of the Partners@International web application or its documentation may have been designed or developed by third party licensors, and may include software licensed by such third parties who may hold you responsible for any copyright infringement.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_257448901.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_4_copy_1

guidetextdraw_copy_c_1404316738._value:
Applicable Legislation

This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Province of Québec and the federal laws of Canada. The parties agree that this Agreement and all documents related thereto be in both official languages of Canada.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_1404316738.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_4_copy_2

guidetextdraw_copy_c_1838968684._value:
Severability

If any part of this Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable, then that part shall be deemed omitted and the rest of the Agreement shall continue in full force and effect.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_1838968684.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_4_copy_3

guidetextdraw_copy_c_52566885._value:
Official Notices

GAC adheres to policies and guidelines established by the Government of Canada regarding copyright, external hyperlinks, official languages and privacy. For full details, please visit the "Terms and Conditions" page. Where the GAC Terms and Conditions and this Agreement conflict, the terms of this Agreement shall prevail.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_52566885.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_4_copy_4

guidetextdraw_copy_c_984666797._value:
Termination

GAC may terminate this Agreement if you fail to perform any of your obligations set forth in this Agreement.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_984666797.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_4_copy_5

guidetextdraw_copy_c_1323540335._value:
Entire Agreement

This Agreement and any and all notices on this web site constitute the entire agreement between you and GAC with respect to the use of this web site, the Partners@International web application and its documentation. No supplement, modification or amendment to this Agreement and no waiver of any provision of this Agreement shall be binding on GAC unless executed by GAC in writing.

To proceed with the registration process, please select the check box. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise specified.
guidetextdraw_copy_c_1323540335.name: textdraw1585848351240_copy_4_copy_5_copy_1

guidenumericbox.jcr:title: Business Number
guidenumericbox.longDescription:
For Canadian organizations, the Business Number is a federal numbering system which is assigned to a business (one number per business) by the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA). A complete Business Number has two parts: the registration number (first nine digits) and the account identifier (two letters and four digits). For registration, we require only the first nine digits of your Business Number. For more information please visit the CRA (Canada Revenue Agency) website.

For non-canadian organizations, this is the incorporation or registration number assigned to your organization in the country in which it is incorporated or registered.
guidenumericbox.name: egcs_crabusinessnumber

orgshortnametf.jcr:title: Organization Short Name
orgshortnametf.longDescription: This is a short version of your Organization Name, created by you. It will be used for identification purposes. You may be asked to choose a new Organization Short Name if that name has already been chosen by another organization in the system. Your Organization Short Name can be up to 8 characters long. You can use letters and numbers. You cannot use spaces, punctuation or special symbols. For example, An organization called "Western Manufacturing" could choose the short name: WestMan or Wmanu or WMfg.
orgshortnametf.name: gac_organizationshortname
orgshortnametf.validatePictureClauseMessage: Cannot use spaces, punctuation or special symbols.

orgLegalName.jcr:title: Organization Legal Name
orgLegalName.longDescription: The Legal Name is the name that appears on your organization's financial statements, bank statements and other legal documents. It is the name that must appear on contractual documents and purchase orders between Global Affairs Canada and your organization, as well as on your organization's invoices and on payments made by Global Affairs Canada to your organization.
orgLegalName.name: orgLegalName

guidetextdraw._value: English or French Legal Name is a required field.
guidetextdraw.name: legalNameErrorMsg

orgOperationalname.jcr:title: Organization Operating Name
orgOperationalname.longDescription: The organization's operating name is the name by which your organization is known to its clients and to the public. It is the name used in the course of day-to-day business and usually appears in the telephone directory and on your organization's business cards, letterhead, signs and other promotional items. Note: It may be the same as the legal name or the name of the individual. Example: Legal name: G W Line Ltd. Operating name: Canadian Tire.
orgOperationalname.name: orgOperationalname

guidetextdraw_166494._value:
Notes to Applicants

  1. In this section, Applicants can upload supporting documentation needed for a decision regarding their application 
  2. It is mandatory to download, fill and upload a current copy of Form 2555E (Declaration regarding outstanding debts due to her Majesty). 
    • This form can be downloaded at:
      • https://www.international.gc.ca/department-ministere/assets/pdfs/forms-formulaires/2555e.pdf
  3. All other files are optional 
  4. Accepted file formats can be .pdf,.doc,.docx, .xls, .xlsx,.png,.jpg,.gif, 
  5. It is important to label each uploaded file for easy identification 
  6. Each file size may not exceed 10MB 
  7. Applicant can upload as many files as needed 
  8. If you wish to make changes to file, Delete the uploaded file by selecting X on the corresponding file and upload a new one after deletion 
  9. After completing this page, click the "Done" button to exit the registration.
